title: Data Science Practical Competency Strengthening: Social Constructivist-Based Approach for Enhancing Core Palliative Care Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and patient counseling experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more core palliative care ethical principles (respect for autonomy, pain relief, fairness, etc.) to VR simulation scenarios.
Learners can collaborate with interdisciplinary team members to implement patient-family-centered communication strategies in VR environments.
Learners can achieve over 85% appropriateness scores in palliative care decision-making processes through simulation-based formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
